Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Member of the editorial board of the collection “Monografías y Academia published by CIS (Centro de Investigación Sociológica), Madrid
Member of the International Advisory Board of "Research in Social Stratification and Mobility"
Member of the International Advisory Board of "Sociology of Education"
Member of the International Advisory Board of Research of the journal Empiria

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Is there a new service proletariat? Postindustrial employment growth and social inequality in Spain. Paper presented at the annual conference of the European Consortium for Sociological Research (ECSR), Paris

Persistent Inequalities? Expansion of education and class inequality in Italy and Spain. Paper presented at the Spring meeting of the Research Committee 28 on Social Stratification and Mobility in Nijmegen

Is there a new service proletariat? Postindustrial employment growth and social inequality in Spain. Paper presented at the Spring meeting of the Research Committee 28 on Social Stratification and Mobility in Nijmegen
Globalization and the death of social class. Paper presented at the annual conference of European Consortium for Sociological Research, Groningen

Employment insecurity, wrong pathway and class inequality in educational opportunities: the transition to post-compulsory education in Spain. Paper presented at the mid-term conference of EQUALSOC, Berlin, 9-10 April

Employment insecurity, wrong pathway and class inequality in educational opportunities: the transition to post-compulsory education in Spain. Paper presented as invited speaker at the ESF conference THE TRANSFER OF RESOURCES ACROSS GENERATIONS, Vadstena, Sweden, 9-13 June

Cumulative social science: The four sociologies and social stratification, paper presented at the 7th International Conference of the Research Committee 33 on Logic and Methodology in Sociology of the International Sociological Association, Napoli

Employment insecurity, wrong pathway and class inequality in educational opportunities: the transition to post-compulsory education in Spain. Paper presented as invited speaker at the seminar of The Center for the Study of Wealth and Inequality (CWI), Columbia University, New York

Compensation and incomplete information: does school results matter differently depending on the social background?, paper presented at the integrative section of the RC28 (Social stratification), RC5 (Sociology of education) and RC45 (Rational choice) at the ISA World Congress, Gothenburg 11-17 July 2010.

Class, education and inequality, invited speaker at the opening ceremony of Conference EUROEPI 2010 - Epidemiology and public health in an evolving Europe, organized by the International Epidemiological Association, European Epidemiology Federation and Italian Epidemiological Association, Florence 6-9 November 2010

Participation, equality of opportunity and returns to tertiary education in contemporary Europe, paper presented AlmaLaurea International Conference on “Human Capital and Employment in the European and Mediterranean Area” Bologna, 10-11 March
Social origin inequality in educational returns, paper presented a the ECSR annual conference, Dublin
When month of birth matters. Educational performance, birth date and the compensatory effect of class of origin, speaker in a plenary session of the ECSR/EQUALSOC conference in Stockholm
Long term trends in educational inequality Spain: Class and Gender inequalities, paper presented at the ISA RC28 meeting, Trento
Parental separation and inequality, paper presented at FamiliesAndSocieties Stakeholder Seminar, SOLOMONIC CHOICES. PARENTAL SEPARATION AND FAMILY POLICIES IN EUROPE, Brussels
Is Divorce a social Equalizer?, paper presented at the FamiliesAndSocieties mid-term conference, Madrid

Inequality in educational returns in comparative perspective, paper presented as invited speaker in a plenary session at the international conference “How do educational systems shape educational inequalities?”, Luxembourg

Trends in educational mobility in USA: from a lower to an higher education (im)mobility equilibrium?, invited speaker at the Conference “Sociology as a Population Science”, 13th May, Nuffield College,
Education as the Great Equalizer? Invited talk at the Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences, Hendrik Muller Summer Seminar, Amsterdam
The Iniesta Effect. Sport events and fertility, paper presented at the annual congress of the European Consortium for Sociological Research, Oxford

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Incarico del Laboratorio de la Fundación Alternativas, Madrid per scrivere un rapporto di ricerca sulla bassa natalità in Spagna e lo politiche pubbliche (http://www.fundacionalternativas.org/la boratorio/documentos/documentos-de-traba jo/el-deficit-de-la-natalidad-en-espana- analisis-y-propuestas-para-la-intervenci on-publica)

Preparation of an Annual Report on Development 2010 (Contract amendment nno 2009/02 to Contract N. Com/MS/2008/T/01/SC/001), European Commision, ERD2010 Team member. Responsability: revision of the final report and help in drawing the the policy conclusions for the final report
Incarico per verifica fattibilita' del Progetto "Pari Opportunita'" dell'Osservatorio della Fondazione Cariplo

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Tre sessenni di ricerca riconosciuti dalla Comisión Nacional Evaluadora de la Actividad Investigadora, 1995-2000, 2001-2006 e 2007-2012 (http://www.mecd.gob.es/servicios-al-ciu dadano-mecd/catalogo/general/educacion/0 50920/ficha.html) del ministero dell'istruzione Spagnolo. Nota: per ogni sessennio viene valutata la qualità di 5 articoli scelti dal candidato, in base all'impact factor della rivista e il numero di citazioni ottenute
Certificate of Excellence in Reviewing 2013, Research in Social Stratification and Mobility

Abilitazione nazionale come professore ordinario (Catedrático de Universidad) della Agencia Nacional de Evaluación de la Calidad y Acreditación (ANECA) del Ministerio de Educación, Cultura y Deporte, Spagna

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Tutti gli insegnamenti presso l'Istituto Universitario Europeo sono rivolti a studenti di dottorato Dal 2010 ho tenuto i seguenti seminari per studenti di dottorato: Introduction to Quantitative Methods (2011, 2012, 2013, 2015) Advanced Research Design (2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016) Social inequality in comparative perspective (2011) Family Dynamics and Inequality (2012) Event-history Analysis (2011) E i seguenti workshops: Family Dynamics and Inequalities in Childrens' Life Course (10-11 June 2013) Inequality in Educational Returns, (21-22 June 2012) Level and Inequality in Educational Returns in Europe, (12-13 March 2010)
Ho diretto 6 tesi di dottorato (già difese) all'Istituto Universitario Europeo. Al momento dirigo la tesi ad altri 14 dottorandi dell'Istituto Universitario Europeo

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Introduction to event history analysis, corso per studenti di dottorato (15 ore), presso Centro de Estudios Avanzados en Ciencias Sociales (CEACS) del Instituto Juan March, Madrid (ogni anno dal 2002 al 2007)
Event History Analysis using Stata for Political and Social Scientists, corso per studenti di dottorato; 12 ore; Oxford Spring School in Social Science Research Methods, Oxford University
Introduction to event history analysis, seminario per dottorandi, 12 ore, Dipartimento di Science Politiche e Sociali, Universitat Pompeu Fabra, Barcelona
Dynamic analysis; graduate level; 9 hours seminar; Centro de Investigaciones Sociológicas (CIS) Madrid (http://www.cis.es/cis/opencms/en/), 2007, 2008, 2009

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Revisore per: American Sociological Review; American Journal of Sociology; Social Forces; Social Science Research; European Sociological Review; European Societies; International Sociology; Journal of European Social Policy; Southern European Politics and Society; Polis; Revista Internacional de Sociología; Revista Española de Investigaciones Sociológicas; Revista Española de Sociología; Demographic Research; Social Policy & Administration; European Political Science Review; Sociology of Education; Journal of Ethnic and Migration Studies; International Migration; Research in Social Stratification and Mobility; Acta Sociologica; Migration Studies.
Membro della commissione nazionale (Comisión de Selección de proyectos de I+D) per la valutazione dei progetti di ricerca finanziati dal ministero dell'istruzione Spagnolo (2006 e 2007)
Revisore esterno (external reviewer) per il programma Academia 2009 dell'ICREA (Catalan Institution for Research and Advanced Studies)
Member of the advisory research board of the Danish National Centre for Social Research (SFI)
Revisore esterno (Expert reviewer) per il Turku Institute for Advanced Studies (TIAS), Finland, 2013
Revisore esterno (external reviewer) per il programma Academia 2015 dell'ICREA (Catalan Institution for Research and Advanced Studies)

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Member of the EPUSE (Employment precarity, unemployment and social exclusion) project funded by the European Commission (DGXII), Fourth Framework Programme (TSER), University of Trento and Oxford.

Member of the GLOBALIFE (Life-courses in the Globalisation process) project funded by the Volkswagen Foundation, University of Bielefeld; short-listed for the 2006 European Union Descartes Prize for Scientific Research
Member of the project Welfare state and dependency: public spending and family formation (BSO-2003-08298) financed by the Spanish Minister of Education

Member of the project Immigration, Welfare State and new patterns of social inequality in Spain (Inmigración, Estado del bienestar y nuevas pautas de desigualdad social en España), financed by the Spanish Minister of Education
Member of the project Occupational stratification and educational performance in Spain: Job-skills match, immigration, and retirement, 2010-2012, financed by the Spanish Minister of Education.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Coordinator (with prof. V. Stocké, University of Kassel) of the project EDUREU (Level and Inequality in Educational Returns in Europe), financed by EQUALSOC network of excellence funded by the European Union’s Sixth Framework Programme (15 researchers involved from from 7 EU countries).

Coordinator (with Juho Harkonen, University of Stockholm), Work-package 5, Seventh Framework Programme, FamiliesAndSocieties – Changing families and sustainable societies: Policy contexts and diversity over the life course and across generations
